p: Berries of Piper cubeba Bojer were purchased from a traditional market in Purworejo, Indonesia in 2016 and authenticated by Herbarium Bogoriense, Bogor, Indonesia. The samples were cleaned with tap water, sterilized and dried in an oven at 60 °C for three days before pulverized into a fine powder. The plant powder was then stored in sealed containers at 4 °C until used. Black pepper ( Piper nigrum L.) powder was purchased commercially in Japan (Gaban, Co. Ltd.; Tokyo, Japan). The seeds of Bidens pilosa and Echinochloa crus-galli were collected in paddy fields on July 2017 in Higashi Hiroshima, Japan. The seeds germination was randomly tested and was >80% germination.
